name: 李春穎
objective: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同分析方法（如能量法及Castigliano定理）、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等。
schedule:
1 Fundamental Principles/ 1 week
2 Working Stresses and Failure Theories/ 2 weeks
3 Design of Shafts/ 2 weeks
4 Springs/ 2 weeks
5 Screws/ 2 weeks
6 Belts, Clutches, Brakes, and Chains/ 2 weeks
7 Welded and Riveted Connections/ 2 weeks
8 Lubrication/ 1 week
9 Ball and Roller Bearings/ 1 week
10 Spur Gears/ 1 weeks
11 Helical, Bevel, and Worm Gears/ 1 week
12 Miscellaneous Machine Elements/ 1 weeks
scorePolicy:
第一次期中考30%
第二次期中考30%
期末考30%
出席及平時表現10%
materials:
1. Design of Machine Elements, by Spotts, Shoup & Hornberger, 8/e, 2013, Pearson
2. Juvinall's Fundamentals of Machine Component Design, by Juvinall & Marshek, 6/e (SI version), 2018, Wiley
3. Shigley's Mechanical Engineering Design, by Budynas & Nisbett, 10/e (SI version), 2015, McGraw-Hill
4. Machine Elements in Mechanical Design, by Mott, 5/e, 2014, Pearson
